items.Justification: While this paper discusses single-photon phase spectrum recovery, it is not directly related to adaptive optics or atmospheric turbulence monitoring in FSOC.
This paper focuses on deep learning for photonic neural networks, which is tangentially related to optical communication but not the main areas of interest.
This paper deals with machine learning for resource allocation in hybrid LiFi and WiFi networks, which is not directly relevant to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper explores LLMs, EEG, and behavioral data for measuring attention and sleep, which is not related to optical engineering or FSOC.

This paper discusses optimal joint fronthaul compression and beamforming design for networked ISAC systems, which is somewhat related to FSOC but does not directly address adaptive optics or atmospheric turbulence monitoring.
